breakingChangesNotes:
**Note:** Users who are already not using the legacy API (i.e., have the 'Use legacy API' parameter unchecked) will not experience any changes in functionality or behavior.


The *Use legacy API* parameter is deprecated as of September 30th, 2025, and the legacy API will no longer be in use. This affects multiple areas of functionality:

**Direct Commands:**
- cs-falcon-search-detection
- cs-falcon-resolve-detection
- cs-falcon-get-detections-for-incident

**Fetch Operations:**
- fetch-incidents (all detection types including endpoint, IDP, mobile, ODS, OFP, NGSIEM, and third-party detections)
- fetch-events (XSIAM detection fetching)

**Mirroring Operations:**
- get-remote-data (detection mirroring)
- get-modified-remote-data (detection change tracking)
- get-mapping-fields (detection field mappings)

**Configuration Changes:**
- The 'Use legacy API' parameter is now hidden and will be removed in future versions
- Removed legacy-specific status options from cs-falcon-resolve-detection command: in_progress, true_positive, false_positive
- Updated parameter descriptions to remove legacy version references

**Context Output Changes:**
- Removed legacy-specific context outputs from cs-falcon-search-detection command:
  - CrowdStrike.Detections.behaviors.behavior_id
  - CrowdStrike.Detections.behaviors.ioc_source
  - CrowdStrike.Detections.behaviors.ioc_description
  - CrowdStrike.Detections.first_behavior
  - CrowdStrike.Detections.last_behavior
  - CrowdStrike.Detections.max_confidence
  - CrowdStrike.Detections.max_severity
  - CrowdStrike.Detections.max_severity_displayname
  - CrowdStrike.Detections.assigned_to_uid
  - CrowdStrike.Detections.assigned_to_name

**Impact:** The legacy API endpoints and data structures will no longer be supported. All detection-related operations will use the updated Raptor API format. Users should test their detection workflows and update any custom scripts or playbooks that depend on the legacy detection format, removed context outputs, or deprecated status options.
